name: Rachel O'Malley is 'The Healer' Quiz | Literature | 10 Questions

questions.text: What disaster is Rachel working on at the beginning of the story?
questions.explanation:
flood.

	Rachel, Jack, Lisa, and Stephen are working at a flood.

questions.text: What does Rachel get from Jennifer to read on the plane to Maryland?
questions.explanation:
diary.

	Rachel gave Jennifer a diary the first day Jennifer arrived at Trevor House, and Jennifer gave it back to Rachel to read on the plane ride to Maryland.

Joseph.

	Rachel asked if it was Clarence.

False.

	Cole's kiss was quick and unexpected. After it, Rachel kissed him again.

questions.text: What is the name of the woman who Rachel is trying to get together with her brother Stephen?
questions.explanation:
Ann.

	Ann has two children, Adam and Nathan.

questions.text: Which two O'Malleys get married in this story?
questions.explanation:
Lisa and Kate.

	The O'Malley clan set Kate's wedding up so she wouldn't convince Dave to elope, and both Lisa and Quinn decided they would get married as well. They had a double wedding so that Jennifer could see two of the O'Malleys get married.

questions.text: Did Rachel pick Gage instead of Cole?
questions.explanation:
no.

	Rachel had always been attracted to Cole. She made sure that Cole understood that Gage would always be an important part of her life, but that she loved him.

questions.text: What is the name of the teenage girl Rachel befriended and helped throughout the story?
Jennifer dies of cancer in this story.
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Tom took her to a park and she died in his arms as the sun came up.

questions.text: Which sibling leaves at the end of the story?
questions.explanation:
Stephen.

	Stephen leaves at the end of the story to parts unknown, giving way to his book 'The Rescuer', due out in April 2003.
